analysis.key_quote: Schedule F is ultimately designed to allow firings of personnel without any real cause other than a superior feels it will serve their own political purposes - this is exactly the opposite of the stability needed to attract smart and devoted employees into the federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the need for stability and protections against political influence in federal employment, which aligns with concerns about politicization and due process rights.
